rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Foyer
rooms.description: A spacious entrance area that welcomes natural light, decorated with a subtle Vastu-compliant design featuring east-facing window to bring positive energy. It includes seating and storage.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open living space with south or west orientation for maximum sunlight exposure, featuring large windows to enhance ventilation. Minimalist decor aligns with contemporary design and Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, this area benefits from a north-facing window for natural light, ensuring energy flow is balanced according to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Kitchen and Utility
rooms.description: Efficiently designed kitchen with south-east orientation as per Vastu. Features modern appliances, natural ventilation through windows and skylight options.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office space located in a quiet corner of the apartment with north-west exposure to enhance concentration, equipped with ample natural light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom designed with west or south orientation for optimal sunlight. Includes storage and closet areas ensuring energy balance per Vastu norms.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact guest bathroom placed near the master bedroom, optimized for ventilation and light while maintaining privacy.
